All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountProfileScreenFragment
AccountProfileScreenFragment allows users to view and edit their profile information.
AdministratorActivity
Handles administrative activities within the application, facilitating operations such as user management, event handling, and content management through a bottom navigation bar interface.
AdministratorActivityTest
IMPORTANT!!! comment out the line 86: authenticateUser(this); of AdministratorActivity class otherwise this test will FAIL.
AdministratorDashboardFragment
A Fragment representing the dashboard view for administrators.
AdministratorEvent
This class defines an event (queried from the database) and is used to store its name and details.
AdministratorEventDetailsFragment
Fragment to display detailed information about an event in the administrator's dashboard.
AdministratorEventTest
 
AdministratorImage
Represents an image associated with an administrator's dashboard, either related to a profile or an event.
AdministratorImageDetailsFragment
A Fragment that displays detailed information about an image, which can either be a profile picture or an event poster.
AdministratorImageTest
 
AdministratorProfile
Represents a user profile within the administrative section of the application.
AdministratorProfileDetailsFragment
A Fragment that displays detailed information about a user profile, including the profile's image, name, contact information, and homepage URL.
AdminPasswordFragment
A DialogFragment that prompts the user to enter an administrator password.
AttendeeActivity
AttendeeActivity manages the main UI for attendee users within the application, providing navigation through a bottom navigation bar to various fragments such as notifications, event scanning, and event details.
AttendeeActivity.DocumentIdCallback
Interface for handling the retrieval of a document's unique ID from Firestore.
AttendeeActivity.FCMTokenCallback
Interface for handling the reception of a Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) token.
AttendeeActivityTest
IMPORTANT!!! comment out the line 80: authenticateUser(this); of AttendeeActivity class otherwise this test will FAIL.
AttendeeEventDetailsFragment
A Fragment representing the event details page for attendees.
AttendeeEventViewDetailsFragment
Fragment for displaying the detailed view of an event to an attendee.
AttendeeHomePage
The AttendeeHomePage fragment serves as the main dashboard for attendees upon successful login.
AttendeeNotificationsFragment
A Fragment that displays notifications to the attendee.
AttendeeScanFragment
AttendeeScanFragment provides a user interface for attendees to scan QR codes within the event app.
AttendeeSignedUpEventsDetailsFragment
A Fragment for displaying detailed information about an event the attendee has signed up for.
CameraIntentTest
IMPORTANT!!! comment out the line 86: authenticateUser(this); of AttendeeActivity class otherwise this test will FAIL.
CapActivityForAttendeeQRScannerPage
Uses CaptureActivity for attendees to scan QR codes
CurrentEventsFragment
The CurrentEventsFragment is responsible for displaying a list of events that the user is currently signed up for.
EditProfileScreenFragment
This is the Edit profile screen fragment that allows the user to update his User info.
EditProfileScreenFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
Interface for implementing onFragmentDestroyed().
EditProfileScreenTest
 
EventArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter to display a list of AdministratorEvent objects within a ListView.
EventArrayAdapter.OnEventSelectedListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an event is selected.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
GenerateProfilePic
This class is for generating a profile picture based on users initials References: OpenAI, 2024, ChatGPT, Code to create a circular bitmap image
GenerateProfilePicTest
 
HomeScreenFragment
This is the homescreen fragment that inflates after the User has updated his information on the edit profile page.
ImageArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter to display a list of AdministratorImage objects in a ListView within the administrator dashboard.
ImageArrayAdapter.OnImageSelectedListener
Interface for callbacks when an image is selected from the list.
IntentTest
 
MainActivity
This Screen allows the user to login either as an Attendee/Organizer/Administrator Depending on what button the user clicks, he is takes to the screen
MainActivityTest
 
Notif
Represents a notification object within the application, specifically for the attendee interface.
NotifArrayAdapter
NotifArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter designed to display notification objects (Notif) within a ListView.
NotifArrayAdapter.OnNotifSelectedListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a notification is selected.
NotifViewDetailsFragment
NotifViewDetailsFragment is a Fragment subclass used to display the details of a specific notification.
OrganizerActivity
The following class is responsible for all activities related to the Organizer
OrganizerActivity.DocumentIdCallback
Interface for handling the asynchronous nature of firebase
OrganizerAttendeeCheckin
Represents attendee check-in details for an organizer.
OrganizerAttendeeCheckinArrayAdapter
Adapter class for attendees
OrganizerAttendeeCheckinListActivity
Class that handles the list view for checkinList
OrganizerAttendeeListMenuFragment
Handles all activities related to the Attendee List menu
OrganizerAttendeeSignup
Class for retrieving signed-up Attendee name and ID.
OrganizerAttendeeSignupArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of signed-up Attendees.
OrganizerAttendeeSignupListActivity
Class that handles the list view for checkinList

OrganizerGeolocationMenuFragment

OrganizerNotificationsMenuFragment

A custom ArrayAdapter designed to handle lists of AdministratorProfile objects.

Interface for receiving notification when a profile is selected.
